name: Band Club
des:
You became a member of Kokatsu Academy's band club!
Practice hard and show off the fruits of your labor!
desUnlock: Band club practice has been unlocked.

name: Band Club
des: Take up the bass and give it a try. Your passion and talent outshines a few missed notes.

name: Band Club
des: The song was a bit difficult but you are beginning to understand its underlying meaning and composition.

name: Band Club
des: The song was a bit difficult but you fully understand its underlying meaning and composition.

name: Band Club
des: The notes comes together beneath your deft fingers, conveying the emotions hidden within the song.

name: Band Club
des: Your fingers masterfully dance across the strings, perfectly conveying the emotions hidden within the song.

name: Band Club
des: You could perform on a professional stage. You found yourself in the music and added some special touches.

name: Band Club
des: Professionals would bow down to your performance. You deftly made the song your own!

name: Band Club
des: Your jaw-dropping technique is proof that you are the Beast of Band Club.

name: Band Club
des: Your skills have transcended the limits of earthly bounds. You have conquered music.

name: Soccer Team
des:
You became a member of Kokatsu Academy's soccer team!
Join practice and strengthen the team.
desUnlock: Soccer team practice has been unlocked.

name: Soccer Team
des:
Practicing every day is essential.
Join practice and improve your soccer skills.

name: Soccer Team
des:
Teamwork and strategy play an equally important role.
Join practice and hone your soccer skills.
desUnlock: Difficulty 4 unlocked. Insight raised to Lv. 2.

name: Soccer Team
des:
The team is growing stronger. The next step is to go against top teams in the regional tournament.
Join practice and get ready for the big match.
desUnlock: Difficulty 5 unlocked. Insight raised to Lv. 3.

name: Soccer Team
des:
Doing well in the tournament will not only put Kokatsu in the spotlight, but also boost morale.
Join practice and give it your all.
desUnlock: Difficulty 6 unlocked. Insight raised to Lv. 4.

name: Soccer Team
des: The team needs to focus on physical training. It all comes down to speed, stamina, and power.
desUnlock: Difficulty 7 unlocked. Insight raised to Lv. 5.

name: Soccer Team
des:
Strengthening Kokatsu's teamwork with group activities is a good way to deepen trust and understanding between members.
Join practice and give it your all.
desUnlock: Difficulty 8 unlocked. Insight raised to Lv. 6.

name: Soccer Team
des: As the soccer team grows stronger, Kokatsu turns to improving the team's leadership skills. Cultivating a sense of responsibility, the team sets their sights ever higher.

name: Soccer Team
des:
As the soccer team steadily grows stronger, Kokatsu decides to hold an exhibition and charity match to showcase. The academy's name is on the line.
Go to practice and give it your all.

name: Soccer Team
des: Kokatsu Academy's soccer team has become a force to be reckoned with. Continue conquering the field and never settle for less.
